name: MyRio Robot
desc: A custom-built robot powered by a MyRio computer and programmed in LabView. The robot can either be steered by the user using a hacked Wii Remote or ran automatically using a simple AI algorithm. The algorithm utilizes onboard infrared sensors to detect obstacles and rotate accordingly.

name: Atari 2600 Pong Clone
desc: A simple Pong clone created to run on real Atari 2600 hardware. It was written using a combination of BASIC scripting and MOS 6502 assembly language.
